v.v: I am Joel son of Pethuel. This is a message that Yahweh gave to me.
You leaders of Israel, and everyone else who lives in this country, listen to this message!
Tell your children about it,
I am talking about the locusts that have eaten our crops.
You people who are drunk, wake up!
Huge swarms of locusts have entered our country.
They have destroyed our grapevines and our fig trees
Cry and wail as a young woman does
There is no more flour or wine for us to offer to be sacrifices at the temple,
The crops in the fields have been ruined;
You farmers, grieve!
The grapevines and the fig trees have withered,
You priests, put on rough sack clothes and wail.
Set apart a day for when the people should go without food.
Terrible things are happening to us!
Our crops are already gone,
When we plant seeds, they do not grow;
Our cattle groan, searching for a pasture with some grass to eat,
Yahweh, I cry out to you,
It is as though even the wild animals cry out to you
Blow trumpets on Mount Zion,
That will be a very dark and gloomy day;
It is as though they bring flames of fire
The locusts resemble horses,
Leaping over the mountaintops,
When people see them coming,
The locusts climb over walls like soldiers do;
They rush straight ahead
They swarm over the city walls and enter our houses;
It is as though they cause the earth to shake and the sky to tremble.
Yahweh leads this army of countless locusts,

v: Nothing like this has ever happened during the time that we have lived
or during the time when our ancestors lived.

The first swarm of locusts came and cut many of the leaves of the crops;
then another swarm came and ate the rest of the leaves,
then another swarm came hopping along,
and finally another swarm came
and they destroyed everything else.
Wake up and wail loudly,
because all the grapes are ruined,
and so there will be no new wine!
They are like a powerful army
that has very many soldiers;
no one can count them.
The locusts have teeth that are as sharp as the teeth of lions!

The grain has been destroyed,
there are no grapes to make wine,
and there is no more olive oil.
You who take care of grapevines, wail,
because the grain has been destroyed;
there is no wheat or barley growing.
and the pomegranate trees, palm trees, and apricot trees have also dried up.
The people are no longer joyful.
You who serve God by offering sacrifices on the altar,
wear those sack clothes all night to show that you are mourning,
because there is no flour or wine to be offered at the temple of your God.
Tell the leaders and the other people to gather at the temple
and to cry out to Yahweh there.
It will soon be the time when Yahweh, who is the Almighty God, will punish us,
when he will cause us to experience more disasters.
